recipesJson.name: Eclipse'd

recipesJson.description: Clone version of Eclipse by Space Jam... Not mine, it's been posted all over the internet, so I don't really know where it came from to give credit... Just posting it up because I enjoyed it when I started vaping... This recipe is spot on! ðŸ˜¤ðŸ’¨ðŸ’ª

reviews.text: never had the original but I love western and this sounded good. about 3 days only into the steep and this stuff is delicious. I cant wait to get 2-3 weeks in
